title: October 11, 2019: Pundi X (NPXS): Down 7.27%
text:
How Did Pundi X’s Price Fare Yesterday?

Pundi X is down by approximately 7.27% from the previous day, with its price currently hovering around $0.000208 USD. The down day for Pundi X yesterday was a reversal from the day before it, which puts its price at 19.39% below its 20 day moving average. Over the past two weeks, price has been in a down trend. In terms of an expected trading range, the Bollinger bands on Pundi X suggest price may bounce between $0.000209 and $0.000307 based on its momentum and volatility over the past 14 days. Given its boundaries, rangebound traders may find it compelling to entertain buying, as we are nearer to the bottom of the range.

Trade Pundi x (NPXS) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

The currency’s market cap currently stands at $51 million US dollars.

Daily Engagement Metrics Update

999 transactions amongst holders of Pundi X occurred yesterday. In terms of estimating the number of holders, over the past day the total number of wallets holding Pundi X has gone up by approximately 35. If we observe percentage growth in holders and transfers, we find that Pundi X ranks 16 out of the 33 Ethereum tokens we are tracking.

Observing Pundi X’s Richest Wallets

Of the coin’s total money supply, the richest 1,0000 wallets currently own 88.08%. The percent of the currency that is owned by wallets that are both belonging to exchanges and in the top 1,000 richest wallets of the token comes out to 11.83% of the currency’s money supply. In terms of growth rates, the share of total supply of the richest 1,000 wallets has grown by -0.09% over the past week. For the exchange wallets within the richest 1,000 wallets, their share has grown by -0.31%. As for the Pundi X’s smart contract itself, that owns 0.02% of the total money supply, an amount unchanged from the week prior.

How Much Development is Occurring?

The last activity date on Pundi X’s GitHub repository was September 27, 2019, or about 14 days ago. Growth rates for open issues — a “”to-do list”” of sorts and watchers (“”subscribers”” following a code repository) for Pundi X are growing by 0 and 0.03, respectively, over the past 30 days.

Pundi X’s Social Media Presence

In terms of social media presence, Pundi X saw its Reddit subscribers go up by 10 over the past 24 hours. Traders interested in following Pundi X has the biggest presence on Twitter, where it has 66,561 users engaged. Use this link to follow Pundi X on Twitter.

Where to Buy

You can trade Pundi x, listed under the symbol NPXS, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX.

Article by SixJupiter
